text: “Nena (kwa osakhulupirira a m’Makka mowachenjeza): “Ikhulupirireni (iyi Qur’an) kapena musaikhulupirire, (zonse zili m’chifuniro chanu.) Ndithu amene adapatsidwa nzeru kale (yozindikira za m’mabuku a Allah Qur’an isanadze) ikamalakatulidwa kwa iwo (Qur’aniyi) amagwa ndi zibwano zawo molambira
